String.string: Our future is in your hands!
Speak with Elleon in Muhrak's Workshop.
Go speak to Elleon in front of the Labyrinth of Terror.
Go to Shriekaal Hall. [You must select Labyrinth of Terror (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:253#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Speak with Jelena in the Labyrinth of Terror.
No...! I, I don't want to die!!... Icaruna...
Use the {@LinkCreature:3008#1500#Kriegar Hall Teleportal} to go to Kriegar Hall and defeat {@LinkCreature:3008#4000#Killian}.
Retrieve the gem that can get you into the Ebon Tower.
Return to Habere and ask Jelena how Elleon is doing.
